name: Eroblast
description:
"So you know that story where you play a boring normal student going about your boring normal day when suddenly, for no reason at all, the most popular girl on campus invites you to join the music club with five hot girls who all want to be your girlfriend?
Yeah, that dream was nice. In Right Swipes, you actually have to earn your way to a date.
Right Swipes is a dating sim set in a dating app. Browse photos, swipe right, find your match and romance attractive, adult characters with their own love lives and full-fledged story. Exchange passionate messages and flirty selfies, or the other way around.
Each girl you match plays out like a mix of visual novel and puzzle game. Chat a bit via direct messages, get to meet the girls and once it’s time for a cool pick-up line or a hot topic question, you get to choose the next message you send and see their reactions.
But dating is not that easy. You see, before each choice, you will play a unique anime puzzle game level. The higher you score, the more options you will have to choose for your next message.
There are more than a hundred levels designed by hand and more than a dozen unique mechanics, don’t expect a basic puzzle game slapped on top of anime girls. If you don’t adapt your strategies, you won’t unlock your true chatting seducer potential and uncover the secrets of waifu love.
There are quite a few potential girlfriends to match with, from seductive bishoujo women to ditzy anime klutz, from tough biker to cute moe girl (and secret hentai artist), find your perfect match, chat with them, flirt with them, build a relationship and grow old with them. Well that last one is not in the game yet, but maybe in the sequel, who knows?
Of course, nothing is preventing you from going the multiple dates route and trying to match-3 or more seductive women at the same time to create your own harem of passion and romance, but, you know… That’s no way to treat a waifu, this ain’t a hentai game, son.
And remember, in Right Swipes you can be sure of one thing: there are definitely hot single anime girls in your area.

Q: I’m a VN veteran, how much can I expect?
A: Each route has 30 choices with several answers leading to short branches, and between 5,000 and 10,000 words overall.
Q: How many waifus?
A: At the time of launch, there are 6 romanceable women.
Q: And CGs?
A: Five per girl, currently.
Q: How many levels?
A: Close to 100 for launch, and each is designed by hand - no auto-generated levels."
